lead_paragraph: NASA announced on Thursday the companies it had selected for a second round of contracts to take cargo to the International Space Station.
snippet: NASA announced on Thursday the companies it had selected for a second round of contracts to take cargo to the International Space Station.

headline.main: Contracts Announced for Runs to Space Station
headline.print_headline: Contracts Announced for Runs to Space Station

abstract: NASA announces Space Exploration Technologies Corporation, Orbital ATK and Sierra Nevada Corporation have been selected in second round of contracts to transport payloads, including scientific equipment, to International Space Station.
